article_title: Richmond School Board questions lack of action on warehouse sale
article_text:

og.description: After years of criticism for failing to sell off properties to fund repairs of its aging facilities, the Richmond School Board is anxiously awaiting a return on a key parcel it turned over to the city last spring.
